mapper.select: SELECT history_id, soft_id, branch_id, history_version, history_path, upload_date, operator, appPkt_date, appPkt_new, appPkt_path, appPkt_size, appPkt_md5 FROM software_history WHERE soft_id = #{softId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT history_id, software_history.soft_id, server_software.name, software_history.branch_id, software_branch.branch, history_version, history_path, upload_date, operator, appPkt_date, appPkt_new, appPkt_path, appPkt_size, appPkt_md5 FROM software_history left join server_software on software_history.soft_id = server_software.id left join software_branch on software_history.branch_id = software_branch.branch_id WHERE history_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT appPkt_date, appPkt_size, appPkt_md5 FROM software_history WHERE history_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT software_history ( history_id, soft_id, branch_id, history_version, history_path, upload_date, operator, appPkt_date, appPkt_new, appPkt_path, appPkt_size, appPkt_md5 ) VALUES ( #{historyId}, #{softId}, #{branchId}, #{historyVersion}, #{historyPath}, #{uploadDate}, #{operator}, #{appPktDate}, #{appPktNew}, #{appPktPath}, #{appPktSize}, #{appPktMd5} )
mapper.update: UPDATE software_history SET history_path=#{historyPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator=#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_date=#{uploadDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, appPkt_path=#{appPktPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appPkt_new=#{appPktNew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appPkt_size=#{appPktSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, appPkt_md5=#{appPktMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE history_id = #{historyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM software_history left join software_branch on software_history.branch_id = software_branch.branch_id WHERE software_history.soft_id = #{softId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and software_branch.branch = "master"

SELECT software_history.history_path FROM software_history left join software_branch on software_history.branch_id = software_branch.branch_id WHERE software_history.soft_id = #{softId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and software_branch.branch = "master"

SELECT software_history.history_id, software_history.soft_id, software_history.branch_id, software_history.history_version, software_history.history_path, software_history.upload_date, software_history.operator, software_history.appPkt_date, software_history.appPkt_new, software_history.appPkt_path, software_history.appPkt_size, software_history.appPkt_md5 FROM software_history LEFT JOIN software_branch on software_history.branch_id = software_branch.branch_id RIGHT JOIN server_software ON server_software.latest_version = software_history.history_version and server_software.id = software_history.soft_id WHERE software_history.soft_id = #{softId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and software_branch.branch = "master"

SELECT history_id, soft_id, branch_id, history_version, history_path, upload_date, operator, appPkt_date, appPkt_new, appPkt_path, appPkt_size, appPkt_md5 FROM software_history where soft_id = #{softId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM software_history WHERE soft_id IN (SELECT id FROM server_software WHERE kind = #{kindId})
